topic: radiance-online will be down for server upgrade
body:
Hi all,


The radiance-online server will be down from tonight, 26.2.04, 17:00 
UTC, for some major software updates. It should be up and running as 
usual on Monday, 1.3.04 . This effects all operations on the machine:


   1. Incoming mails are queued, but you may get some notifications from
      the failback mail handling system at FhG-ISE saying it can't reach
      radiance-online.
   2. web and CVS access is down


Sorry for any inconvenience this may cause, adding future features to 
the site will be greatly eased by this long awaited reconfiguration of 
the core.


regards
Peter Apian-Bennewitz




 pab-opto, Freiburg, Germany, http://www.pab-opto.de
 [see web page to check digital email signature]
___
<sup>Automatically generated content from [radiance mailing-list](https://radiance-online.org/pipermail/radiance-general/2004-February/001484.html).</sup>
